entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight. A few flurries or rain showers beginning overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
